component.name: Mass Renamer
component.summary: Rename multiple files at once quickly and easily

description.p: Mass Renamer is a simple yet powerful tool for renaming multiple files simultaneously. It is ideal for organizing photo collections, music libraries, or any set of files that need a consistent naming pattern.

ul.li: Numbered list view of original and new names.
Automatically load all filenames from a selected folder, if so desired.
Quickly add or remove any file extensions.
Transfer extensions from original names to new names.
Undo the last renaming operation safely, even after an app or system crash.
Cross-platform filename validation for Windows, macOS, Linux and Android.
Multiple themes to match your desktop environment.

screenshot.caption: Settings window with Ubuntu light theme

description.p: This is a small update focused on improving compatibility and small UI adjustments.

ul.li: Switched the packaging tool from "AppImageTool" to "Linux Deploy" for better compatibility across distros.
Adjusted the texts on some buttons, because they were longer than the buttons on some distros, depending on the system fonts settings.
